metadata.synopsis: Kobold Looter summons new kobolds to ambush the players, because they dared to try and loot/confront the mighty Bugthimble
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Dig up Kurwin's Coffin- Do anything to get the Kobold into combat- Bugthimble will summon them on her first turn

0.speaker: Bugthimble
0.text: I ain't doing this by m'self. Get yer tails up here!
